body_html:
Removing the mkl option isn't a fix and that DEIGEN_USE_VML flag definitely does nothing. Getting same errors on Centos 6.5, Python 2.7, TF 1.6, Devtoolset 6. Any other viable solutions?

bazel build --linkopt='-lrt' --verbose_failures --action_env PATH="$PATH" --config=mkl --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
